name: Turbo Drift: out of control
description:
Enter Coin To Start

Turbo Drift: Out Of Control is our submission for the gmtk game jam 2020

Your car's brakes are missing, how long will you hold out of control?

As Phil Twists and Turns out of the way of incoming traffic, his turbo meter will fill up, get it to the top to fix up his collapsing vehicle.

Credits:

background music by smokepincher (https://m.soundcloud.com/user-979334746-900719616)

sfx from https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/packs/16681/
